Detailed Description

FD Network implementation based two file descriptors used for communication. All output messages are write to the output file descriptor using the internal representation : each message is defiend as sequence of: 1/ AggrHeader 2/ Aggregated messages: [HeaderAM + data IA]...[HeaderAM + data IA] [data DA]...[data DA] All input messages are read from the input file descriptor.
